future.title: Future Sustainability
future.description: Around us are many individuals with great ability to create progress in the world. In order to drive progress in the world, we need to make an effort immediately. This platform is used to support existing progress by collaborating, educating, and defining actions to be taken to realize real change.

global.title: Global Impact
global.description: Creating worldwide positive change through sustainable development initiatives

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Building strong partnerships to achieve sustainable development goals

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Developing creative solutions for sustainable future challenges

action.title: Action-Oriented
action.description: Taking concrete steps towards achieving sustainable development goals

sdgs.title: Sustainable Development Goals
sdgs.subtitle: Unsoed Contribution to The SDGs Goal
sdgs.description: Every year, Unsoed will report on its contribution to the global SDGs by identifying activities at Unsoed that are relevant to the SDGs. This reporting will provide a clear perspective on the sustainability goals and help set significant targets.

1.title: No poverty
1.description: End poverty in all its forms everywhere

2.title: Zero hunger
2.description: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition

3.title: Good health and well-being
3.description: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

4.title: Quality education
4.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education

5.title: Gender quality
5.description: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

6.title: Clean water and sanitation
6.description: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation

7.title: Affordable and clean energy
7.description: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy

8.title: Decent work and economic growth
8.description: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth

9.title: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure
9.description: Build resilient infrastructure and promote sustainable industrialization

10.title: Reduced inequalities
10.description: Reduce inequality within and among countries

11.title: Sustainable cities and communities
11.description: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

12.title: Responsible consumption and production
12.description: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

13.title: Climate action
13.description: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

14.title: Life below water
14.description: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources

15.title: Life on land
15.description: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems

16.title: Peace, justice, and strong institutions
16.description: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development

17.title: Partnerships for the goals
17.description: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize global partnership

footer.address: LPPM Building UNSOED 3rd Floor, Dr. Soeparno Street, Karangwangkal, Purwokerto, Central Java 53122

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates about our programs and activities

description.first: To facilitate and synergize Unsoed's activities in the fields of education, teaching, and community service (Tridharma), Unsoed is committed to establishing the SDGs Center to explore, collect, develop, and disseminate knowledge that benefits sustainable development and welfare for society.
description.inauguration: Unsoed SDGs Center was then inaugurated by the Ministry of National Development Planning (Bappenas) on December 18, 2024 at Java Heritage Hotel, Purwokerto.
description.second: To achieve the Sustainable Development Goals as a national development goal, the Unsoed SDGs Center plays a role in achieving the Sustainable Development Goals by providing innovations and solutions for SDGs, creating current and future SDGs implementers, showing how to support, adopt, and implement SDGs, and developing cross-sectoral partnerships and leadership as a guide in responding to SDGs.

partnerships.title: Partnerships for Sustainability
partnerships.description: Unsoed partners with various donor agencies, governments, community-based organizations, non-governmental organizations (NGOs), businesses, and other intermediaries to expand its reach and gain benefits to support shared sustainability goals.

highlights.title: Project Highlights
highlights.description: Highlighting existing projects at Unsoed by presenting a news list containing information on initiative updates. The newsletters communicate the progress of initiatives that support sustainability goals and tangible results.

mapping.title: Research Mapping
mapping.description: By making a meaningful contribution, Unsoed expands the scope and rationale of its research for development strategy by fully considering the 17 core needs in the Sustainable Development Goals.

exploration.title: Research Exploration
exploration.description: Exploring innovative solutions for sustainable development challenges

analysis.title: Data Analysis
analysis.description: Analyzing impact and effectiveness of initiatives

collaboration.title: Research Collaboration
collaboration.description: Building partnerships for shared research goals

education.title: Education for Sustainable Development
education.description: In order to promote a more just and sustainable society, Unsoed supports education that helps people change their knowledge, skills, values and attitudes. In addition, Unsoed also equips people to meet the needs of each individual through an integrated and balanced approach to sustainable development.

seminar.title: Seminar
seminar.description: A meeting that aims to realize sustainable development for university members and the general public.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.description: A series of gatherings involving many individuals to discuss, learn, and work, which includes individual engagement in realizing sustainable development as an outreach to university members and the general public.

course.title: Course
course.description: A series of learning conducted over a period of time on knowledge and skills relevant to the goal of realizing sustainable development, both for university members and the general public.

community.title: Community Service
community.description: Community service and empowerment programs are an important part of Unsoed. Unsoed has conducted community service activities for students integrated through the Real Work Lecture (KKN) program as well as various services carried out which aim to achieve sustainable goals.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.description: Discover how we engage with and empower communities through various sustainable development initiatives.

kkn.title: Real Work Lecture (KKN)
kkn.description: An integrated program where students engage directly with communities, implementing sustainable development practices and solutions.

publication.title: SDGs Publications
publication.description: Unsoed SDGs Publication as a forum needed to be able to support SDGs in Indonesia in terms of innovation and sustainable implementation of SDGs in society by presenting publications that contain information about the linkage of existing activities with sustainability goals and tangible results.

mapping.title: SDGs Implementation Mapping
mapping.description: Explore how Unsoed maps and aligns university activities with SDGs objectives and implementation.

course.title: Course Integration
course.description: Integration of SDGs content in courses and KKN programs

ownership.title: SDGs Ownership
ownership.description: Building a sense of ownership towards SDGs implementation

priorities.title: Strategic Planning
priorities.description: Identifying priorities, opportunities, and global action plans

internalization.title: SDGs Internalization
internalization.description: Ensuring continuous SDGs internalization across university elements

expert.title: Our Experts
expert.description: Meet our dedicated team of experts working towards sustainable development goals.

seminar.title: SDGs Educational Seminar
seminar.description: Join our comprehensive seminar series designed to deepen your understanding of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Through interactive discussions with leading experts, academics, and practitioners, you'll gain valuable insights and practical knowledge for implementing sustainable development initiatives.

highlights.title: What You'll Get
highlights.experts: Learn directly from leading SDG experts and practitioners with real-world experience in sustainable development
highlights.interactive: Engage in dynamic discussions and hands-on workshops that bring SDG concepts to life
highlights.insights: Gain deep insights into global sustainability challenges and innovative solutions
highlights.networking: Connect with a diverse community of professionals, academics, and change-makers

sustainability.title: Sustainable Development Fundamentals
sustainability.description: Master the core principles and practices of sustainable development, including environmental stewardship, social equity, and economic viability

implementation.title: SDG Implementation Strategies
implementation.description: Learn practical approaches and best practices for implementing SDGs across different sectors and organizational contexts

innovation.title: Innovation for Sustainability
innovation.description: Explore cutting-edge solutions and innovative approaches to addressing sustainable development challenges

workshop.title: Practical SDGs Workshop
workshop.description: Our workshops are designed to provide hands-on skills in supporting SDG achievement. Through interactive sessions, participants learn to implement innovative and sustainable solutions across various fields, from renewable energy to inclusive education and local economic empowerment.

renewable.title: Renewable Energy
renewable.description: Learn practical approaches to implementing renewable energy solutions and sustainable resource management

education.title: Inclusive Education
education.description: Develop strategies for creating inclusive educational environments and programs that leave no one behind

economic.title: Local Economic Empowerment
economic.description: Master techniques for strengthening local economies and creating sustainable livelihood opportunities

methods.title: Our Approach
methods.interactive: Hands-on learning sessions that engage participants in real-world problem solving
methods.practical: Focus on practical skills and implementable solutions that can be applied immediately
methods.collaborative: Group activities and peer learning to enhance knowledge sharing and networking
methods.innovative: Introduction to innovative tools and methodologies for sustainable development

course.title: SDGs Course Program
course.description: Our comprehensive course program offers in-depth learning on SDGs through a balanced theoretical and practical approach. Participants gain extensive knowledge and explore relevant case studies to understand the challenges and opportunities in achieving sustainable development goals.

approach.title: Learning Approach
approach.theoretical: Strong theoretical foundation in sustainable development principles and frameworks
approach.practical: Hands-on exercises and real-world applications of SDG concepts
approach.casestudies: Analysis of relevant case studies from various sectors and regions
approach.comprehensive: Comprehensive coverage of all 17 SDGs and their interconnections

foundations.title: SDG Foundations
foundations.description: Introduction to sustainable development concepts, history of SDGs, and key frameworks

implementation.title: Implementation Strategies
implementation.description: Practical approaches to implementing SDGs in different contexts and sectors

advanced.title: Advanced Applications
advanced.description: Specialized topics, emerging trends, and innovation in sustainable development

outcomes.title: Learning Outcomes
outcomes.knowledge: Deep understanding of SDGs and sustainable development principles
outcomes.skills: Practical skills for implementing and measuring SDG progress
outcomes.network: Access to a network of sustainability professionals and experts
outcomes.certification: Professional certification recognizing your expertise in SDGs

others.title: Supporting SDGs Activities
others.description: Various activities such as social campaigns, community service programs, and collaborative projects form an integral part of our efforts to support SDGs. Through concrete actions, we aim to create positive impacts on the environment and society while encouraging active involvement in achieving more inclusive and sustainable development.

awareness.title: Raising Awareness
awareness.description: Conducting campaigns to increase public awareness about SDGs and sustainable development issues

engagement.title: Community Engagement
engagement.description: Engaging communities through participatory activities and social media campaigns

impact.title: Impact Creation
impact.description: Designing campaigns that create measurable social and environmental impact

collaboration.title: Collaborative Action
collaboration.description: Working with various stakeholders to amplify campaign reach and effectiveness

training.title: Training & Project Program
training.description: Our training and project program is designed to equip communities with practical skills and innovative solutions that support the achievement of SDGs. Through an action-based approach, participants engage in sustainable projects that create direct impact across local economic empowerment, environmental management, and education quality improvement.

economic.title: Economic Empowerment
economic.description: Develop practical skills for local economic development, entrepreneurship, and sustainable business practices

environmental.title: Environmental Management
environmental.description: Learn effective approaches to environmental conservation, resource management, and sustainable practices

education.title: Education Enhancement
education.description: Master techniques for improving education quality and implementing inclusive learning programs

handson.title: Hands-on Learning
handson.description: Direct engagement with real-world projects and practical implementation of solutions

mentoring.title: Expert Mentoring
mentoring.description: Guidance from experienced professionals throughout project development and implementation

collaboration.title: Community Collaboration
collaboration.description: Working together with local communities and stakeholders to ensure project relevance and sustainability

impact.title: Impact Focused
impact.description: Emphasis on creating measurable positive changes in target communities

outcomes.title: Project Outcomes
outcomes.skills: Participants gain practical skills and experience in implementing sustainable development initiatives
outcomes.projects: Successfully completed community projects with measurable positive impacts
outcomes.network: Development of strong networks and partnerships with various stakeholders
outcomes.impact: Long-term positive changes in community well-being and environmental sustainability

student.title: Student Community
student.description: The student community plays an active role in supporting SDGs through various social, educational, and advocacy initiatives. With the spirit of collaboration, students can create positive movements that focus on global issues such as educational equality, public health, and environmental preservation, and build networks that contribute to sustainable development.

review.title: Critical Reviews
review.description: Critical review-based publications play a role in exploring global issues related to the SDGs through in-depth analysis and academic perspectives. With a reflective and data-driven approach, these critical reviews aim to identify challenges, evaluate policies, and offer innovative solutions to support sustainable development.

journal.title: Scientific Journals
journal.description: Scientific journal publications are an important platform for disseminating research results that contribute to the achievement of SDGs. Through evidence-based studies and scientific methods, the journal supports the development of knowledge, policies, and best practices that can be applied in various sectors to achieve sustainable development goals.
